title: Ticket #3842: Missing .dagman.log files after condor_hold/condor_release
description:
Just ran into a weird situation at BMRB. The user here was running a super-DAG with a whole bunch of sub-DAGs. Partway through the run he wanted to change the config of the super-DAG slightly, so he condor_held all of his jobs and then condor_released them. The weird thing is this: all of the sub-DAGs submitted before the hold/release generated .dagman.log files, and all of the ones submitted after the hold/release did not(!).

The super-DAG still completed okay because it was using a nodes.log file to monitor its children.
